original_title: Bucky Beaver's Triple XXX Rated Stags, Loops, & Peeps!: Volume 38: Solo Gals!
overview: It’s a mid-’60s explosion of go-go boots, high hair, heavy eye-make-up and purple panties! We start with a ciggie-smoking short-haired lanky brunette bad girl, followed by a slender wench with cupcake breasts who just might not be a natural blonde, and then meet a Lauren Hutton-type sleepy blonde with a nice shape and a fetching tan line.  Then greet the bright-eyed black-haired babe spread on her bed spread, and the very cute dark blonde with huge real kazongas who tries, successfully, to hump her couch. Now it’s a blonde Christie Brinkley type...and a voluptuous brunette on a sparkly purple bed...and a curvy black beauty displaying a charming smile and so much more....  MVP award: the gorgeous curvy Ann-Margaret type blonde who loves to suck her finger (I may pass out) . But let’s not forget the rootsy blonde, or the pixie-haired brunette with the flower panties...not to mention the dark-haired busty beauty doing a reclining belly dance. Tequila!
title: Bucky Beaver's Triple XXX Rated Stags, Loops, & Peeps!: Volume 38: Solo Gals!
